htmlform.formName: HMIS 003 HIV Care ART Card - Clinical Assessment
htmlform.formDescription: A visit for a client for clinical assessment

div.h1: HMIS HIV 003:HIV CARE/ART CARD - CLINICAL ASSESSMENT

obs.answerLabels: 1. ART Initiation, 2. ART Refill, 3. ART Regimen Switch/ Substitution, 4. Viral Load, 5. CD4, 6. IAC, 7. T.B Drug Refill,8. T.B Follow up, 9. ANC,10. EID,11. PMTCT, 12. Hypertension/ Diabetes, 13. Nutrition,14. Other Specify
N - Normal, MAM - Moderate Acute Malnutrition, SAM - Severe Acute Malnutrition, SAMO - Severe Acute Malnutrition with Oedema, O - Overweight/Obese
TF - Therapeutic Feeding (F75 F100 RUTF), SF - Supplementary Feeding, IYCF - Infant and Young Child Feeding Counselling ( > 2yrs), NC - Nutrition Counselling only (if > 2yrs)

obs.answerLabel: Not pregnant or not breast feeding

div.div: Intention to conceive in the next three months

obs.answerLabels: No evidence of Malignancy, Not Applicable, Suspicious of Malignancy, Not eligible
1. No signs,2. Suspect,3. Diagnosed with Tb,4. Tb Rx
H0-Never Initiated,H1-On INH,H2-Defaulted,H3-Taken off due to side effects,H4-Completed

obs.answerLabel: 13 - Cough or shortness of breath > 1 week
14 - Fever, chills or night sweats > 1 week
15 - Red/purple or dark spots on skin

div.div: Advanced Disease Status and WHO Clinical Stage

obs.answerLabels: No Advanced Disease, Suspected Advanced Disease, Confirmed Advanced Disease CD4 < 200, Confirmed Advanced Disease-Pos CrAg, Confirmed Advanced Disease-Pos TB, Confirmed Advanced Disease - WHO Stage 3/4, Confirmed Advanced Disease - Child < 5 Yrs

div.div: Hepatitis B status and Syphilis Status

obs.answerLabels: No symptoms,Symptomatic Non-Reactive,Symptomatic Reactive,Symptomatic Reactive and treated
